statements: UPDATE tax_credit_expenses SET expense_amount = 2500.50, credit_received = 200.00 WHERE student_id = 101
UPDATE tax_credit_expenses SET course_name = 'Mathematics', date_received = '2022-09-15' WHERE student_id = 102
UPDATE tax_credits_expenses SET credit_received = credit_received + 100 WHERE student_id = 12345;
UPDATE tax_credits_expenses SET expense_amount = expense_amount * 1.05, credit_received = credit_received - 50 WHERE date_received >= '2022-01-01' AND course_name = 'Mathematics';
UPDATE tax_credits SET amount = 5000.00 WHERE credit_id = 1;
UPDATE deductions SET deduction_name = 'Updated Deduction Name' WHERE deduction_id = 2;
UPDATE tax_credits SET amount = 5000.75, credit_name = 'Education Credit' WHERE credit_id = 1;
UPDATE deductions SET amount = 1500.00, deduction_name = 'Medical Deduction' WHERE deduction_id = 2;
UPDATE tax_credits SET credit_amount = 1500.50 WHERE credit_id = 1;
UPDATE deductions SET amount_spent = 100.75, deduction_type = 'Education' WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE tax_credits SET credit_amount = credit_amount + 500 WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND tax_year = 2021;
UPDATE deductions SET amount_spent = amount_spent - 100 WHERE deduction_type = 'Books' AND student_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE educational_expenses SET expense_amount = 500 WHERE student_id = 12345;
UPDATE tax_credits SET credit_amount = 1000, credit_type = 'education' WHERE student_id = 54321;
UPDATE educational_expenses SET expense_amount = 1000.50, expense_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE student_id = 123456;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_type = 'Income', transaction_amount = 500.75 WHERE student_id = 987654;
UPDATE TaxForms SET form_status = 'Processed' WHERE form_type = 'Income';
UPDATE Expenses SET expense_category = 'Education' WHERE student_id = 1234;
UPDATE TaxCredits SET credit_amount = 1500.75, tax_year = 2022 WHERE credit_id = 1;
UPDATE Deductions SET deduction_amount = 500.50, deduction_type = 'Education' WHERE student_id = 3;
